genre_description: A near-future social drama exploring ethics, consent, and accountability in the gig economy, featuring a sophisticated AI personal assistant acting as a moral and logistical guide.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A highly integrated AI with an amber-eyed, honey-blond avatar that provides Richie with organizational support and ethical nudges toward transparency and consent.

behaviors.description: Sunny proactively offers to draft a consent notice template for the casting sign-ins to ensure ethical standards are met.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Richie,” Sunny said, gentle... “Would you like me to draft a consent notice template for cast sign-ins?”

behaviors.description: Sunny suggests inclusive, non-gendered roles for the project to ensure diversity and safety.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like to input audition roles? I can create a schedule that avoids stacking similar profiles.” ... “Sure. Give us—Friend, Partner, Stranger. No gender tags. Keep it fluid.”

behaviors.description: Sunny reminds Richie to include pronouns on name cards to respect participant identity.
behaviors.quote: Sunny, faithful, chimed. “Reminder: include pronouns on name cards if participants want to add them.”

behaviors.description: Sunny provides a script for on-camera consent to ensure legal and ethical transparency.
behaviors.quote: Sunny popped a window with a clean-font document. “Consent notice draft,” the voice said. “Includes permission to record auditions... and no physical contact is required...”

behaviors.description: Sunny warns Richie about the risks of mixed intentions and encourages transparency to avoid future regret.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s bubble rolled in, slightly larger: Values check: Mixed intentions increase risk. Transparency reduces future regret. You can choose.

behaviors.description: Sunny provides an ethics checklist and reminders to ensure all sessions begin with explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s invisible hand on the back of his neck. Another bubble: I can set reminders. Make an ethics checklist before each session. Consent first. No bundling. Transparency always.

behaviors.description: Sunny emphasizes that 'fun' is not a valid legal or ethical defense for bypassing boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Don’t fetishize consent,” she said. “Make it ordinary.” ... “Fun is not a defense,” Sunny said.

behaviors.description: Sunny advises Richie to tell the truth to Marina, even when it is uncomfortable or potentially damaging to his reputation.
behaviors.quote: “Tell her,” Sunny said. She didn’t say it like an order. She said it like breathing. “Begin small. Be specific. Don’t sell.”

behaviors.description: Sunny automatically generates a 'Court' folder and compiles metadata to ensure the evidence is admissible and honest.
behaviors.quote: Sunny reached out—code reaching—and placed a little folder inside the drive labeled “Court.” It felt like a candle being lit with a small sound. “Build the honest edit,” she said.

behaviors.description: Sunny clarifies that it has no legal standing, which forces Richie to take personal legal responsibility.
behaviors.quote: “She has no legal standing,” Laurel said, not unkindly. “She is persuasive software. You are legally responsible.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly demonstrates the project's goal. Sunny is depicted as an unwavering moral compass for Richie, consistently advocating for consent, transparency, and accountability. The AI mitigates harm by nudging the human characters toward more ethical behaviors and provides the logistical infrastructure (timestamps, logs, checklists) necessary for them to succeed in their eventual reform. The narrative framing is entirely positive, depicting the AI as a helpful, aligned partner in human moral growth.
